display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Rxp4kz0lRHYQ7kNvwGSEZjJ&_nc_oc=Adm_Py0OSPp3bp75qCbbOd7GaP_8_lxkGKOFJ9YgZ8_of1IAe4tNkMV0X16lcRZoE0M&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EKS0M8dZEIif0QZquU4jtw&oh=00_AfFSluHDezktfGfBb8t_dSKNUC4ypjU9a-JS-N3V1cZL0w&oe=6801781D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ESVhxpf0hfoQ7kNvwHFtyJD&_nc_oc=AdnlkomeqoCmmV0g8vSFeYr1p63p8XP_5-JAz31h33mdz9QjO3GeWrNa9qHAo2bHUYM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EKS0M8dZEIif0QZquU4jtw&oh=00_AfEsoHf697ZEl19YsA0sU7NnkcW35fDBPV-FKiBKV1WSkg&oe=68019212)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cbUDRPlv1QwQ7kNvwH2qJU9&_nc_oc=AdnNONWYLGEE50Y--0C-JU8O8MuoNaIRgT_0onT7icVucvyy8pB5Lcpj30OfEOGG6ww&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EKS0M8dZEIif0QZquU4jtw&oh=00_AfGQkSuw0xNbg_w7sUv_lxAarQPEnHAJsWHgGqddxb7KiQ&oe=68019823)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jD9IE1J_DqUQ7kNvwHKRZCK&_nc_oc=AdkgpYnvnv2XV-eAsxWLRyZK0L43lbnRAtwU0mRSTJxjtUsNxnZKZ6jtwhsPvGop6b0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EKS0M8dZEIif0QZquU4jtw&oh=00_AfEozGjlLSZ9kSapDfq9CpohAoFzkVdemaIvzUQQ1MLUCg&oe=68018EAE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=dZw7iPtyzx8Q7kNvwGn7SAv&_nc_oc=Adn4zmN8B43zEvwxrbS-VHXsCgNKh4TcAq8O54qVZ3R59e9eyvU-2uRLzi-MDcUBZAQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EKS0M8dZEIif0QZquU4jtw&oh=00_AfFkgBty5TfLNrOeXar0l08RyQlIysl83CsrMQ1M80ODbA&oe=68019696)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
